posts.postText:
I'm tired of playingthe same maps OBER AND OBER. 

LITERALLY. 

It seems as if I play the same 5 maps a day. 
Peachs castle 
Mario world
Scarisland
Devtown
Minecraft 
EDIT: lost temple 

Can we bring back 67th? ( updated)
And add more maps?
Please post suggestions here.
I KNOW RIGHT! I feel you corey. I never see nexus getting nominated or played on unless server restarts. D:

I think 67th is back, just we really haven't noticed because we've been sort of locked into the same map rotation.

To be fair, I feel a new type of function should be put in the server where if a Map was just played, or is currently being played on, it can not be nominated for an RTV map change. I feel with that it would hopefully add some more variety into the rotation.

Then again I have no idea about coding and what I just said could be impossible or take Gash hours to do, but there's my 2 cents bro

>> To be fair, I feel a new type of function should be put in the server where if a Map was just played, or is currently being played on, it can not be nominated for an RTV map change. I feel with that it would hopefully add some more variety into the rotation. 
To be fair, I feel a new type of function should be put in the server where if a Map was just played, or is currently being played on, it can not be nominated for an RTV map change  FOR THE NEXT 5 ROUND S. I feel with that it would hopefully add some more variety into the rotation.

I fixed it for ya... because otherwise, it wouldnt help all that much.

On a side note, i'll be back to serious mapping (not like confused peice), once a comission is completed.
If I don't like it then I'll cry. So make it good.

>> If I don't like it then I'll cry. So make it good. 
If you are refering to my mapping production, its at the least of 5 maps, so i doubt there wont be at least 1 that tickles your fancy ;p
If you are refering to bob, um, can't vouch :D
Udane, would you teach me a little bit of mapping? I'd be willin to learn. That way I could contribute more than just money!

>> Udane, would you teach me a little bit of mapping? I'd be willin to learn. That way I could contribute more than just money! 


 http://www.youtube.com/user/3kliksphilip  That guy can teach you a lot about mapping.
 http://ttt.badking.net/mapping-guide  And how to apply the TTT specific elements.
Werd. I'll be looking into it tonight then!

>> I want clue back. 
I agree. Why was it ever taken off?

>> I agree. Why was it ever taken off? 
It started causing server crashes; I couldn't find how the map was causing it exactly, so I just removed it.

>> Werd. I'll be looking into it tonight then! 
Thats what I said, I ended up messing around with launcher's all day.


And does this mean we can test clue again.. please!
